# 𒎏 NIN 𒊩𒈠 feminine woman mun nun

𒎏 ⋍ 𒊩 𒌆 SAL.TÚG #šarratum ⇔ TA

𒊩𒌆 ⋍ 𒎏 NIN(TÚG) 𒎐 NIN9 𒊩𒆪 MUN.DUR 𒊪

𒎏 NIN ≈ 𒎐 nin₉ niña sister

𒎏 NIN 𒊩 MUN in 𒀭 𒎏𒄷 mongoose 𒀭𒎏𒈜 ᵈnin-ka₆ ᵈnin-ka5 𒊺𒂗𒄷 še-en-ka₆

gyne

𒂊𒎏𒈾 eg₂-gyn-na again a'xaná ξανά йәнә yänä <> 𒂊𒎏𒈾 e-nin-na ennalleen@FIN again <> عاود تاني ʿāwd tāni 𒂊𒎏𒈾 e-nin-na nano@Tocharian nááná@Navajo נאָכאַמאָל noch einmal … de nouveau

𒎏 e5 ≈ e 𒂊 "princely?"

Geischa

𒎏 GAŠAN 𒂵𒊭𒀭 𒂵𒃻𒀭 𒅗𒊭𒀭 ga-ša-an ga-ša₂an ka-ša-an lady, mistress (also male!) 𒃽 GAŠAN 芸者 geisha(san) 芸子 geiko 芸妓 geigi

first lady

𒎐 𒎏 𒊪 𒎏 ereš #šarratum reverse

𒎏 ereš 1ˢᵗ 𒁮 dame 𒂖 EL el 𒊩𒌆 ereš SAL.TUG₂ ≈ #šarratum

emeš 𒊩𒇬 (|SAL+LAGAR|) "priest"
